TIDY5E.Exhaustion3: Disadvantage on Attack rolls and Saving Throws
TIDY5E.EditHint: Toggles visibility of add/delete buttons and empty sections
TIDY5E.EmptySection: This section is empty. Unlock the sheet to edit.
TIDY5E.GmOnlyEdit: Only your GM can edit this section.
TIDY5E.AttunementWarning: Attunement warning: You can't attune to more than {number} items!
TIDY5E.ToggleMovement: Toggle between modern and legacy speed display
TIDY5E.SearchHint: Just start to type what you are searching for.

TIDY5E.Settings.SheetTheme.name: Tidy5e color theme.
TIDY5E.Settings.SheetTheme.hint: Use either the default light or alternate dark color theme of Tidy5e.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseClassicControls.name: Use classic item controls in list view.
TIDY5E.Settings.UseClassicControls.hint: Always shows item controls and disable right click menu. Only applies for PC item/spell inventory in list layout.

TIDY5E.Settings.ContextRollButtons.name: Show midiQol/Better Rolls Item Button in Context Menu
TIDY5E.Settings.ContextRollButtons.hint: Per default roll buttons appear in the item's description. Enable to move them to the context menu. Useful for grid layout or if you use them frequently.

TIDY5E.Settings.ShowTraitLabels.name: Show Trait Labels.
TIDY5E.Settings.ShowTraitLabels.hint: By default only icons are shown for traits. Enable to display labels as well.

TIDY5E.Settings.HideClassList.name: Hide character class list.
TIDY5E.Settings.HideClassList.hint: Enable to hide the class list below the character's name.

TIDY5E.Settings.DisableInspirationAnimat.name: Inanimate inspiration tracker.
TIDY5E.Settings.DisableInspirationAnimat.hint: Enable to turn off inspiration tracker glow animation.

TIDY5E.Settings.HideIfZero.name: Hide exhaustion and inspiration tracker on 0.
TIDY5E.Settings.HideIfZero.hint: Enable to hide exhaustion and inspiration if 0. Will show on hover.

TIDY5E.Settings.InspirationOnHover.name: Show inspiration indicator only on hover.
TIDY5E.Settings.InspirationOnHover.hint: Enable to only show the inspiration indicator when you hover over the portrait.

TIDY5E.Settings.ExhaustionOnHover.name: Show exhaustion tracker only on hover.
TIDY5E.Settings.ExhaustionOnHover.hint: Enable to only show the exhaustion tracker when you hover over the portrait.

TIDY5E.Settings.DisableHpBar.name: Disable health bar.
TIDY5E.Settings.DisableHpBar.hint: Enable to hide the colored bar indicating the remaining HP (Health Numbers will still be visible).

TIDY5E.Settings.DisableHpOverlay.name: Hide hit point overlay.
TIDY5E.Settings.DisableHpOverlay.hint: Enable to hide the HP overlay for this actor type.

TIDY5E.Settings.PcToggleTraits.name: Toggle empty character traits.
TIDY5E.Settings.PcToggleTraits.hint: By default empty traits are always visible. Enable to add a toggle button.

TIDY5E.Settings.MoveTraits.name: Move traits below resources.
TIDY5E.Settings.MoveTraits.hint: Enable to move traits from the left side below resources.

TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysShowTraits.name: Always show traits.
TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysShowTraits.hint: By default empty traits are hidden by a toggle button. Enable to never hide.

TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysShowSkills.name: Always show skills.
TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysShowSkills.hint: By default unproficient skills are hidden by a toggle button. Enable to never hide.

TIDY5E.Settings.DisableRightClick.name: Disable right click context menu.
TIDY5E.Settings.DisableRightClick.hint: In case of module conflicts or preference you can disable the right click context menu. Items will show a menu icon instead.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseExpandedSheet.name: Expanded Limited view for character sheets.
TIDY5E.Settings.UseExpandedSheet.hint: Displays the entire character sheet (minus the journal) to players with limited permission.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseRoundPortraits.name: Round portrait style.
TIDY5E.Settings.UseRoundPortraits.hint: Choose to enable round portraits/icons for actors.

TIDY5E.Settings.HpOverlayBorder.name: Offset hit point overlay.
TIDY5E.Settings.HpOverlayBorder.hint: Enter offset value to compensate for portrait frames and prevent tinting.

TIDY5E.Settings.GmEditPermission.name: GM can always edit PC sheets.
TIDY5E.Settings.GmEditPermission.hint: Enable to allow GMs to edit PC sheets without toggling the sheet lock.

TIDY5E.Settings.GmEditEffects.name: Only GM can edit active effects.
TIDY5E.Settings.GmEditEffects.hint: Enable to deny players to edit active effects on their sheets. They will still see applied effects.

TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysShowQty.name: Always show item quantity.
TIDY5E.Settings.AlwaysShowQty.hint: Enable to never hide item quantity.

TIDY5E.Settings.DisableInspiration.name: Disable inspiration tracker.
TIDY5E.Settings.DisableInspiration.hint: If your campaign doesn't use inspiration you can disable the tracker completely.

TIDY5E.Settings.ExhaustionEffects.name: Exhaustion effects (uses Active Effects).
TIDY5E.Settings.ExhaustionEffects.hint: Apply corresponding active effects when setting exhaustion levels - requires midiQol for disadvantage rolls!

TIDY5E.Settings.DisableExhaustion.name: Disable exhaustion tracker.
TIDY5E.Settings.DisableExhaustion.hint: If your campaign doesn't use exhaustion you can disable the tracker completely.

TIDY5E.Settings.ShowNpcRest.name: Resting for NPCs.
TIDY5E.Settings.ShowNpcRest.hint: Enable to shows the rest icon/buttons on NPC sheets.

TIDY5E.Settings.LinkMarker.name: Mark linked/unlinked NPCs.
TIDY5E.Settings.LinkMarker.hint: Adds a colored border and icon to linked/unliked NPC sheets.
